model

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    The model for BallWorld. Contains references to all the observer objects that will be painted onto the world. Notifies these observers when the GUI asks to.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      World(IModel2ViewAdapter model2View)
      Constructor for the world model.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Called by the controller to start the timer.

      • loadBall

        public void loadBall(IUpdateStrategy strategy,
                     IPaintStrategy paint)
        Creates a ball with given update strategy and add ball to dispatcher.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the update strategy of ball
        paint - the painting strategy of ball

      • apocalypse

        public void apocalypse()
        Wipes out all objects from the world.

      • update

        public void update(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Method called by the view to instruct the observer elements to paint. Notifies all observing objects (the balls) which will cause them to paint.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object to paint the canvas

      • loadStrategy

        public IUpdateStrategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String className)
        Loads a strategy by the given className. If a the className cannot be matched with any existing strategies, an error strategy that beeps will be returned.
        Parameters:
        className - , String, full or abbreviated name for the strategy
        Returns:
        updateStrategy, IUpdateStrategy

      • loadPaintStrategy

        public IPaintStrategy loadPaintStrategy(java.lang.String className)
        Loads a paint strategy by the given className. If a the className cannot be matched with any existing strategies, an error strategy that beeps will be returned.
        Parameters:
        className - , String, full or abbreviated name for the strategy
        Returns:
        updateStrategy, IUpdateStrategy

      • makeStrategyFac

        public IStrategyFac makeStrategyFac(java.lang.String classname)
        Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname. Returns a factory for a beeping error strategy if classname is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the classname.
        Parameters:
        classname - full or abbreviated name of desired strategy
        Returns:
        A factory to make that strategy

      • makePaintStrategyFac

        public IPaintStrategyFac makePaintStrategyFac(java.lang.String classname)
        Returns an IPaintStrategyFac that can instantiate the strategy specified by classname. The toString() of the returned factory is the classname.
        Parameters:
        classname - full or abbreviated name of desired strategy
        Returns:
        A factory to make that paint strategy

      • combineStrategyFacs

        public IStrategyFac combineStrategyFacs(IStrategyFac stratFac1,
                                        IStrategyFac stratFac2)
        Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IStrategyFac objects. Returns null if either supplied factory is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the toString()'s of the two given factories, concatenated with "-". If either factory is null, then a factory for a beeping error strategy is returned.
        Parameters:
        stratFac1 - An IStrategyFac for a strategy
        stratFac2 - An IStrategyFac for a strategy
        Returns:
        An IStrategyFac for the composition of the two strategies

      • getSwitcherStrategy

        public SwitcherStrategy getSwitcherStrategy()
        Returns the strategy that switcher balls should switch to. Initially StraightStrategy.
        Returns:
        switcher strategy.

      • switchSwitcherStrategy

        public void switchSwitcherStrategy(IUpdateStrategy strat)
        Switch the switcher balls to the given update strategy. Also sets the switch strategy to given strategy.
        Parameters:
        strat - a strategy that switcher balls will be switched to.
